arm.transformationDescription:
[npc.her] arms start to feel strangely tight as pressure builds up under [npc.her] skin. The pressure within [npc.her] arms felt unbearable as if being inflated from the inside. Just before the pain started to become too much to handle, [npc.her] skin when numb. Managing to steady [npc.her] breath, [npc.she] [npc.verb(decide)] to take a look at [npc.her] arms. [npc.her] arms now look strange. [npc.her] arms seemed to of taken on a dull grey colour, as if [npc.her] skin was old latex. Experimentally [npc.she] [npc.verb(try)] to move [npc.her] arm. But in doing so, [npc.she] instantly hear a grizzly ripping noise. [npc.she] [npc.verb(look)] around to find the origin of the noise but realise that it was [npc.her] own skin that had ripped. [npc.she] see a piece of skin hanging from [npc.her] elbow. Hesitantly [npc.she] [npc.verb(decide)] to pull at the skin. In doing so, all of [npc.her] armâ€™s skin comes off like a glove. As [npc.she] [npc.verb(watch)] [npc.her] old skin hit the floor, [npc.she] [npc.verb(forget)] to look at what has replaced it. Slowly [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] to look at [npc.her] new arms, which now are covered in [npc.armFullDescription].
As the final areas of skin change colour, [npc.nameIsFull] are now left with armoured [style.boldYellow(feron arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands have formed into hard, feron hands, complete sharp fingers and tough palms.
